title: Girlfriend Baits Her Plumber Boyfriend To Cheat On Her With Hotter Chick, Still Gets Mad When He Doesn’t Cheat
text:
Look at this half-witted and insecure woman. She goes on the YouTube series To Catch a Cheater and asks for them to set up a scenario where some sexy, busty chick (Who you could easily argue is w y hotter than the girlfriend) hits on her boyfriend. And not just some innocent flirting, it turns to straight up propositioning for a good mouth and panocha fucking. 

The boyfriend, who is a plumber, is called to the home of Alison where there is a sink that is clogged or something. And there begins some overtly sexual dialogue that sounds like the beginning of a cheesy porn flick. Alison is wearing some sexy negligee with her tits all out as she greets the plumber. “It needs lubrication or something,” the woman in need ponders.
She opens up the cabinet under the sink and WHOOPSIES there is her dildo. That may have been the object that was clogging her pipes. He fixes the sink and he is on his way, and even doesn’t charge her because there was never anything wrong with the sink to begin with. But that’s when Alison asks for a hug, but the boyfriend declines. 
The woman then says, “I’m really lonely and I really need some dick in my life, okay?” 
That’s the moment when I looked into local vocational training that offered plumbing classes. 
“You can’t leave without fucking me, one stroke,” she says. One stroke? Who quantifies fucking based on strokes? Handjob, sure, but not fucking. 
That’s when our hero tells her that he has a girlfriend. 
She then asks, “So you’re not gonna fuck the pussy?” And he replies, “No, sorry.” 
Then he leaves. End of story and they live happily ever after right? 
WRONG. 
Despite having proof that her man isn’t a cheater, the girlfriend is upset about “the look” he gave the nearly naked hot chick. “I can see that look,” the girlfriend says. No offense, but this girlfriend has a look too, it’s called condescending bitchface. 
“There’s a look that he gives other women, he’s very flirty,” she continues to complain about her boyfriend who passed up free pussy that was flung at his dick like a goddamn ring toss. 
Ummmm. He didn’t look with his dick so there really isn’t a problem. 
Women are never satisfied. Even if you don’t cheat they still can be so fucking judgey. 
If this loyal boyfriend sees this video he needs to find a trusting GF who appreciates his loyal ass. Preferably this girl’s sister.
